article.description: Robert Morris 51, Mount St. Mary's, Md. 48
article.headline: Robert Morris 51, Mount St. Mary's, Md. 48
article.linkText: Robert Morris 51, Mount St. Mary's, Md. 48
article.story: EMMITSBURG, Md. -- Karon Abraham made four free throws in the final 21 seconds and finished with 13 points to lead Robert Morris to a 51-48 Northeast Conference victory over Mount St. Mary's (Md.) on Saturday. The Colonials (6-9, 2-2) were just 4 of 10 from the free-throw line when Abraham was fouled by David Golloday with Robert Morris clinging to a 47-46 lead. After Abraham made both, Lamar Trice's layup for the Mountaineers (4-13, 2-2) with 5 seconds left cut the lead to one point, 49-48. Trice fouled Abraham with 3 seconds remaining, and the sophomore guard again was successful twice for the final margin. Robert Morris led 45-35 with 5:08 to play before Mount St. Mary's (Md.) scored 11 of the next 12 points. Trice, who led the Mountaineers with 19 points, had five in that stretch. Anthony Myers added 10 points and Russell Johnson had 11 rebounds for Robert Morris.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
